headline: Why Allegion (ALLE) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) fell 2.4% in the afternoon session after Wells Fargo analyst Joseph O'Dea lowered the company's price target, and the stock traded ex-dividend.

raw.summary: Shares of security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) fell 2.4% in the afternoon session after Wells Fargo analyst Joseph O'Dea lowered the company's price target, and the stock traded ex-dividend.

headline: Allegion Stock: Is ALLE Outperforming the Industrial Sector?
summary: Allegion has outpaced the broader industrial sector over the past year, and analysts remain reasonably upbeat on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Electrical Systems Stocks Q3 Teardown: Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) Vs The Rest
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how electrical systems stocks fared in Q3, starting with Allegion (NYSE:ALLE).
